result.markdown:
--- title: "Traffic Overview" --- ```{ojs} //| echo: false // poll again in 10 hours dd = { const url_api = "https://aiu-portal.pockethost.io/api/collections/network_situation/records?sort=-date&perPage=1&skipTotal=1"; let nl = await d3.json(url_api); yield nl.items[0]; while (true) { nl = await d3.json(url_api); yield Promises.delay(3600 * 10 * 1000, nl.items[0]); } } ``` ```{ojs} //| echo: false format_DD = d3.utcFormat("%d") format_DD_MON = d3.utcFormat("%d %B") format_DD_MON_YYYY = d3.utcFormat("%d %B %Y"); week_interval = function (til) { const wef = d3.utcDay.offset(til, -6); let res = ""; if (wef.getFullYear() != til.getFullYear()) { res = format_DD_MON_YYYY(wef) + " – " + format_DD_MON_YYYY(til); } else if (wef.getMonth() != til.getMonth()) { res = format_DD_MON(wef) + " – " + format_DD_MON_YYYY(til); } else { res = format_DD(wef) + " – " + format_DD_MON_YYYY(til); } return res; } til = d3.isoParse(dd.date) latest_date = format_DD_MON_YYYY(til) latest_week = week_interval(til) latest_y2d = "1 Jan – " + format_DD_MON_YYYY(til) nw_date = d3.select("#nw_day_date") .text(latest_date); ``` ```{ojs} //| echo: false // Day day_date = d3.select("#day_date") .text(latest_date); day_traffic = d3.select("#day_traffic") .text(d3.format(",")(dd.day_traffic)); dif_day_prev_week = d3.select("#dif_day_prev_week") .text(d3.format(".0%")(dd.dif_day_prev_week)); dif_day_prev_year = d3.select("#dif_day_prev_year") .text(d3.format("+.0%")(dd.dif_day_prev_year)); dif_day_2019 = d3.select("#dif_day_2019") .text(d3.format("+.0%")(dd.dif_day_2019)); // Week week_date = d3.select("#week_date") .text(latest_week); week_traffic = d3.select("#week_traffic") .text(d3.format(",")(Math.round(dd.avg_week_traffic))); dif_week_prev_week = d3.select("#dif_week_prev_week") .text(d3.format(".0%")(dd.dif_week_prev_week)); dif_week_prev_year = d3.select("#dif_week_prev_year") .text(d3.format("+.0%")(dd.dif_week_prev_year)); dif_week_2019 = d3.select("#dif_week_2019") .text(d3.format("+.0%")(dd.dif_week_2019)); // Year y2d_date = d3.select("#y2d_date") .text(latest_y2d); y2d_traffic = d3.select("#y2d_traffic") .text(d3.format(",")(dd.y2d_flights_total)); avg_y2d_traffic = d3.select("#avg_y2d_traffic") .text(d3.format(",")(Math.round(dd.y2d_flights_daily_average))); dif_y2d_prev_year = d3.select("#dif_y2d_prev_year") .text(d3.format("+.0%")(dd.y2d_diff_previous_year_percentage)); dif_y2d_2019 = d3.select("#dif_y2d_2019") .text(d3.format("+.0%")(dd.y2d_diff_2019_year_percentage)); ``` This page provides an overview of the traffic, [ATFM delay](/definition/atfm-delay/), [punctuality (OTP15)](/definition/punctuality/) and percentage of [operated schedules](/definition/opschedules/) in the [EUROCONTROL Area](/definition/eurocontrol-area/). For a more detailed analysis consult our [Daily traffic variation dashboard][daily_traffic_var]{target="_blank"}. Information on en-route and terminal [service units](/acronym/su/) from the [Central Route Charges Office (CRCO)][crco]{target="_blank"} of EUROCONTROL is available from our [Service Units dashboard][su_dah]{target="_blank"}. [daily_traffic_var]: "Daily Traffic Variation" [crco]: "Central Route Charges Office" [su_dah]: "Service units dashboard" ::: {.panel-tabset} ## Flights --- title: Air traffic statistics --- #### EUROCONTROL area (Network view) ::: {layout="[1, 1]" layout-valign="top"} ```{=html}
